columns.name: PAT_ENC_CSN_ID
columns.description: The unique contact serial number for this contact. This number is unique across all patient encounters in your system. If you use IntraConnect, this is the Unique Contact Identifier (UCI).

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this contact. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this contact.

columns.name: PAT_ENC_DATE_REAL
columns.description: A unique contact date in decimal format. The integer portion of the number indicates the date of contact. The digits after the decimal distinguish different contacts on the same date and are unique for each contact on that date. For example, .00 is the first/only contact, .01 is the second contact, etc.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE
columns.description: The date of this contact in calendar format.

columns.name: NARR_STAFF_PROV_ID
columns.description: Stores the ID of the provider for an event filed during a code or trauma.

columns.name: NARR_STAFF_UNK_ID
columns.description: Stores the unique ID that is given to an unknown provider involved with an intervention until it is linked to an existing provider record.

columns.name: NARR_STAFF_ROLE_C_NAME
columns.description:
Stores the provider capacity (e.g. attending, resident, etc.) during this intervention.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: NARR_STAFF_EVENT_C_NAME
columns.description:
Indicates which type of event has been filed, for example whether a staff member has arrived or departed.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Paged


Responded


Arrived


Departed


Deleted

columns.name: NARR_STAFF_INST_TM
columns.description: The instant at which the staff event is filed.

columns.name: NARR_STAFF_COMMENT
columns.description: The user-entered comment for a staff related event (i.e. marking a provider as paged or arrived).

columns.name: NARR_STAFF_LINKTO
columns.description: Stores the line ID of a different event, if this event was modified or deleted by it.

columns.name: NARR_STF_MODINST_TM
columns.description: Stores the instant of an event's modification or deletion, if applicable.

columns.name: NARR_STAFF_DOCU_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the user who documented this event.

columns.name: NARR_STAFF_IS_AT_YN
columns.description:
Stores whether or not the specified staff member is marked as an attending physician.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes

columns.name: NARR_STAFF_TYPE_ID
columns.description: The ID of the type of the staff recorded in events that represent whether a staff member was paged, arrived, departed, etc.

columns.name: NARR_STAFF_IEV_ID
columns.description: Stores the ID of the event that has updated this event.

columns.name: NARR_STAFF_IEV_LINE
columns.description: Indicates that this event has been updated by another event and links to that event's line.
